mapper.insert: insert into mngbrd values(mngbrd_seq.nextval, 0, #{mngbrd_ctgrno}, #{num}, #{mngbrd_part, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mngbrd_title}, #{mngbrd_content}, #{manager_no}, 0, sysdate, #{mngbrd_attn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mngbrd_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select b.*, m.manager_name from mngbrd b, manager m where b.manager_no=m.no and b.num=#{num} and mngbrd_ctgrno = 34
mapper.update: update mngbrd set mngbrd_part=#{mngbrd_part, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mngbrd_title=#{mngbrd_title}, mngbrd_content=#{mngbrd_content}, mngbrd_attn=#{mngbrd_attn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mngbrd_file=#{mngbrd_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where no=#{no}
update mngbrd set mngbrd_hit=mngbrd_hit+1 where no=#{no}
